channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee LLC -- McAfee Network Security Manager (NSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee LLC -- McAfee Network Security Manager (NSM)

item.title: CVE-2019-3597|2024-08-04T19:12:09.639Z -- mcafee%20llc -- mcafee%20network%20security%20manager%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Manager (NSM) 9.1 < 9.1.7.75.2 and 9.2 < 9.2.7.31 (9.2 Update 2) allows unauthenticated users to gain administrator rights via incorrect handling of expired GUI sessions.

item.title: CVE-2019-3606|2024-08-04T19:12:09.668Z -- mcafee%20llc -- mcafee%20network%20security%20manager%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Data Leakage Attacks vulnerability in the web portal component when in an MDR pair in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) 9.1 < 9.1.7.75 (Update 4) and 9.2 < 9.2.7.31 Update2 allows administrators to view configuration information in plain text format via the GUI or GUI terminal commands.
